IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDescription: ST. MARY'S D'YOUVILLE PAVILION IS ONE OF THE LARGEST NURSING HOMES NORTH OF BOSTON AND THE FLAGSHIP COMPONENT OF THE ELDER CARE SERVICES OFFERED THROUGH ST. MARY'SHEALTH SYSTEM. WITHOUR STATE-OF-THE-ART REHAB CENTER, SPECIALIZED DEMENTIA CARE UNIT, SKILLED AND LONG-TERM CARE TRADITIONAL NURSING CARE, WE PROVIDE OUR RESIDENTS WITH THE MOST ADVANCED TECHNOLOGY AND SKILLED NURSING CARE IN THE REGION. MORE IMPORTANTLY, WEOFFER RESPECT, CARE, AND COMPASSION TO EVERY RESIDENT.
IRS990.MissionDescription: ST. MARY'S D'YOUVILLE PAVILION IS ONE OF THE LARGEST NURSING HOMES NORTH OF BOSTON AND THE FLAGSHIP COMPONENT OF THE ELDER CARE SERVICES OFFERED THROUGH ST. MARY'S HEALTH SYSTEM. WITH OUR STATE-OF-THE-ART REHAB CENTER, SPECIALIZED DEMENTIA CARE UNIT, SKILLED AND LONG-TERM CARE TRADITIONAL NURSING CARE, WE PROVIDE OUR RESIDENTS WITH THE MOST ADVANCED TECHNOLOGY AND SKILLED NURSING CARE IN THE REGION. MORE IMPORTANTLY, WEOFFER RESPECT, CARE, AND COMPASSION TO EVERY RESIDENT.
IRS990.Description: ST. MARY'S D'YOUVILLE PAVILION IS THE FLAGSHIP COMPONENT OF THE ELDER CARE SERVICES OFFERED THROUGH ST MARY'S HEALTH SYSTEM. THE PAVILION OFFERS A STATE-OF-THE-ART TRANSITIONAL REHAB UNIT, SPECIALIZED DEMENTIA CARE UNIT, SKILLED AND LONG-TERM CARE TRADITIONAL NURSING CARE, AS WELL AS THE MOST ADVANCED TECHNOLOGY AND SKILLED NURSING CARE IN THE REGION. MORE IMPORTANTLY, ITS EMPLOYEES PROVIDE RESPECT, CARE, AND COMPASSION TO EVERY RESIDENT.THE PAVILION OFFERS THREE DISTINCT CARE OPTIONS. AT ITS CORE IS A 42-BED PRIVATE ROOM TRANSITIONAL REHAB UNIT, WHICH PROVIDES REHABILITATION CARE FOR THOSE RECOVERING FROM SURGERY, AND ILLNESS, OR INJURY.THE PAVILION ALSO OFFERS SPECIALIZED DEMENTIA CARE THROUGH ITS MARGUERITE'S GARDEN MEMORY CARE UNIT. THIS 42-BED UNIT PROVIDES ALZHEIMER'S SECURITY WHILE SPECIALIZING IN THE CARE OF PEOPLE SUFFERING FROM DEMENTIA AND RELATED FORMS OF ILLNESS. THE 210-BED NURSING FACILITY OFFERS COMPASSIONATE AND FRIENDLY LONG-TERM CARE TO OUR COMMUNITY'S RESIDENTS. EVERYONE LIVING AT ST MARY'S D'YOUVILLE PAVILION, WHETHER FOR A SHORT TRANSITIONAL STAY OR AS PART OF A LONG-TERM PLAN, MAY TAKE PART IN A BROAD RANGE OF SOCIAL ACTIVITIES AND PERSONAL CARE SERVICES.

Activity2.Description: ST MARY'S D'YOUVILLE PAVILION ENDEAVORS TO INCORPORATE THE EDEN ALTERNATIVE WITH THE REAL WORLD OF DAILY PRACTICE. THE EDEN ALTERNATIVE IS A PHILOSOPHY THAT SUPPORTS CREATING A CULTURE THAT NURTURES THE HUMAN SPIRIT.

Activity3.Description: ST MARY'S D'YOUVILLE PAVILION SPONSORS A SUCCESSFUL AGING SERIES WHICH HELPS ATTENDEES COPE WITH THE PHYSICAL, EMOTIONAL AND SPIRITUAL CHANGES THAT COME WITH AGING.

Form990ScheduleCPartIV.Explanation: ST. MARY'S D'YOUVILLE PAVILION IS A MEMBER OF THE MAINE HEALTH CARE ASSOCIATION AND A PORTION OF THE DUES PAID IN THE AMOUNT OF $6,679 IS USED FOR LOBBYING.

Form990ScheduleJPartIII.Explanation: LEO MYLES RECEIVED A SUPPLEMENTAL EMPLOYEE RETIREMENT PLAN CONTRIBUTION OF $182,000. THE AMOUNT IS INCLUDED IN TAXABLE WAGES IN 2010. JAMES CASSIDY RECEIVED A SUPPLEMENTAL EMPLOYEE RETIREMENT PLAN CONTRIBUTION OF $136,381. THE AMOUNT IS INCLUDED IN TAXABLE WAGES IN 2010

IN CONJUNCTION WITH COVENANT HEALTH SYSTEMS THE ORGANIZATION MAINTAINS AN INCENTIVE COMPENSATION PLAN FOR EXECUTIVES THAT IS ADMINISTERED BY COVENANT HEALTH SYSTEM'S COMPENSATION COMMITTEE. THE PLAN PROVIDES EXECUTIVES WITH THE OPPORTUNITY TO EARN REASONABLE INCENTIVE COMPENSATION BASED ON THE PERFORMANCE OF THE INDIVIDUAL EXECUTIVE, AS MEASURED AGAINST GOALS THAT ARE SET AT THE BEGINNING OF THE YEAR.

Form990ScheduleLPartIV.DescriptionOfTransaction: COMPENSATION PAID FOR SERVICES RENDERED TO LINDA MYLES, SPOUSE OF LEO MYLES, PRESIDENT/CEO

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 6
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: THE ORGANIZATION HAS SOLE CORPORATE MEMBER.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 7A
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: THE CORPORATE MEMBER MAY APPOINT OR REMOVE ONE OR MORE MEMBERS OF THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 7B
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: THE CORPORATE MEMBER HAS THE RIGHT AND RESPONSIBILITY TO APPROVE DECISIONS MADE BY THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: FORM 990 IS PROVIDED TO THE BOARD MEMBERS AND REVIEWED AT THE JULY MEETING.

GeneralExplanation.ReturnReference: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: THIS PROCESS IS THE RESPONSIBILITY OF ORGANIZATIONAL INTEGRITY OFFICER. A FORM IS USUALLY SUBMITTED TO ALL LEADERSHIP, BOARD MEMBERS, BOARD COMMITTEE MEMBERS, EMPLOYED PHYSICIANS, MEDICAL DIRECTORS AND CERTAIN EMPLOYEES IN KEY POSITIONS (I.E. PURCHASING STAFF) ANNUALLY TO BE COMPLETED. REMINDERS ARE USUALLY SENT TO MAKE CERTAIN ALL CONFLICT OF INTEREST FORMS ARE RETURNED.

GeneralExplanation.ReturnReference: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: EVERY TWO TO THREE YEARS THE COMPENSATION COMMITTEE OF THE COVENANT HEALTH SYSTEMS BOARD OF DIRECTORS ENGAGES AN EXTERNAL CONSULTANT TO PROVIDE COMPETITIVE MARKET DATA FROM VARIOUS SURVEY SOURCES, WHICH IS USED TO DEVELOP RECOMMENDATIONS FOR CHANGES TO THE COMPENSATION PROGRAM. SINCE 2003, THE COMPENSATION COMMITTEE HAS ENGAGED MERCER HUMAN RESOURCES CONSULTING TO CONDUCT THIS ANALYSIS. OBJECTIVES ARE TO ASSESS THE COMPOSITENESS OF THE CURRENT TOTAL CASH COMPENSATION LEVELS OF THE SENIOR LEADERSHIP TEAM; DEVELOP MARKET BASED COMPETITIVE SALARY RANGES FOR ALL EXECUTIVE POSITIONS AND ENSURE THAT THE ANNUAL INCENTIVE OPPORTUNITIES, IF THERE ARE ANY, ARE COMPETITIVE AND REASONABLE.

GeneralExplanation.ReturnReference: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: THE ORGANIZATION PROVIDES FORM 1023 AND FORM 990 TO THE PUBLIC WHEN REQUESTED. THE ORGANIZATION DOES NOT CURRENTLY PROVIDE ACCESS TO GOVERNING DOCUMENTS CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY OR FINANCIAL STATEMENTS.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: CHANGES IN NET ASSETS OR FUND BALANCES:

Form990ScheduleRPartII.PrimaryActivities: AFFORDABLE HOUSING FOR THE LOW INCOME
